Airline.Text: Preparation 20 to 60 minutes, air time counts
Preparation: 20 to 120 minutes
Start #1 first, warm up; cool down
OETD, OETA (not when substituting for A320)
Start #1 first; warm up, cool down
Must have between 1.5T and 10T of fuel on landing
Must have between more 2243kg of fuel on landing
All PIREPs are reviewed
Start #2 first, warm up; cool down
Must have at least 1.5T fuel on pushback and 1T on landing
Preparation 20-40 minutes, air time counts
Warm up, cool down
Preparation 20-40 minutes, block time counts
Start #2 first, warm up; cool down
Flight time above 20%/20 minutes of scheduled requires review
Preparation 20-40 minutes, air time counts
Preparation 20-40 minutes, air time counts
Start #2 first, warm up; cool down
Must have no more than 20T of fuel on landing
Preparation 20-180 minutes, air time counts
Start #2 first, warm up; OETA, cool down
Preparation 20-50 minutes, block time counts
Start #1 first, OETD, warm up; OETA, cool down
Flight time above 30%/45 minutes of scheduled requires review
Must have at least 1000kg fuel on landing
Preparation 10-40 minutes, air time counts
Start #2 first, warm up; cool down
Taxi in/out time above 50% of expectation requires review
Must have at least 1000kg fuel on pushback and landing
Preparation 10-50 minutes, block time counts
Flight time above 30%/45 minutes of scheduled requires review
Taxi times >200% of average or pre-set maximum requires review
OETD/OETA
Must have at least 1500kg of fuel on landing
Preparation 15-60 minutes, air time counts
Start #2 first, warm up
Flight time above 20%/20 minutes of scheduled requires review
Must have at least 998kg of fuel on landing
Preparation 20-60 minutes, air time counts
Start #1 first; cool down
Start #2 first; cool down
Must have at least 2000kg fuel on landing
Must have between 2T and 20T fuel on landing
Preparation 15-40 minutes, block time counts
Start #1 first, warm up; OETA, cool down
Pause in flight requires PIREP comment
Must have at least 2000kg of fuel on landing
Preparation 15-60 minutes, air time counts
Start #1 first, OETD, warm up; OETA, cool down
Pauses in flight of over 60 cumulative minutes requires PIREP comment
Flight time above 25%/30 minutes of scheduled or average requires review
Preparation 0-35 minutes, air time counts
Start #2 first
Must have at least 1200kg of fuel on landing
